      • getCryptoToken

        CryptoToken getCryptoToken​(int cryptoTokenId)
        Parameters:
        cryptoTokenId - ID
        Returns:
        the specified CryptoToken or null if it does not exis. Throws RuntimeException if allow.nonexisting.slot=false (default) and a PKCS#11 slot does not exist.

      • mergeCryptoToken

        int mergeCryptoToken​(CryptoToken cryptoToken)
              throws CryptoTokenNameInUseException
        Add the specified CryptoToken to the database and return the id used to store it
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - Token
        Returns:
        Merged token
        Throws:
        CryptoTokenNameInUseException - if nme in use

      • removeCryptoToken

        boolean removeCryptoToken​(int cryptoTokenId)
        Remove the specified CryptoToken from the database.
        Parameters:
        cryptoTokenId - the id of the crypto token that should be removed
        Returns:
        true if crypto token exists and is deleted, false if crypto token with given id does not exist

      • getCryptoTokenIds

        List<Integer> getCryptoTokenIds()
        Returns:
        a list of all CryptoToken identifiers in the database.

      • getCryptoTokenIdToNameMap

        Map<Integer,​String> getCryptoTokenIdToNameMap()
        Returns:
        a list of all CryptoToken identifiers and corresponding human readable name in the database.

      • isCryptoTokenNameUsedByIdOnly

        boolean isCryptoTokenNameUsedByIdOnly​(String cryptoTokenName,
                                      int cryptoTokenId)
        Parameters:
        cryptoTokenName - Name
        cryptoTokenId - ID
        Returns:
        true if the specified name is used by exactly one CryptoToken and that cryptoToken has the same id (checks the database, not the cache)
